attributes.action: intervene in the matter of closing the CSA within the DWP Ministry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the csa has proved ineffectual in carrying out the task it was designed to do,and in fact causes great distress to the children it is ment to serve as it puts undue strain on their parents often resulting in suicide and therefore in need of total abolishan and reform.
